brand_identity.name: CareerArchitect
brand_identity.design_principle: Fusion of Swiss Design Poster aesthetics with Financial Terminal utility.

rules: Body text must use 'Manrope'. Use 'text-pretty' for paragraphs.
Data/Scores/Metrics must use 'JetBrains Mono' to emphasize the 'technical/ATS' nature.
Uppercase labels must use 'tracking-[0.2em]' and 'text-xs' or 'text-[10px]'.

visual_enhancers.grid_system: Visible Grid Borders. Use 'border-r' and 'border-b' on grid items with 'border-black/5' to create a subtle technical graph paper feel.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Hard shadows for a brutalist touch. 'shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_rgba(0,0,0,1)]' for primary CTAs.
visual_enhancers.borders: Sharp edges preferred. 'rounded-sm' or 'rounded-none'. Max radius '4px'.
visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on the background to reduce digital sterility.

animations.loading: Blinking cursor effect for text generation.

landing_page.description: Asymmetrical grid. Hero section should not be centered. Use a split layout where typography dominates one side and a 'Live Resume Preview' dominates the other.
landing_page.hero_section: Large 'Chivo' typography (text-7xl). 'Upload Resume' CTA should be a massive, high-contrast block.

dashboard.description: Dense, data-rich interface. Resembles a flight cockpit or financial terminal.
dashboard.ats_score_card: Must use the 'Tracing Beam' effect. A glowing border that highlights the score. The score itself should be a large Monospace number.

resume_preview.style: Paper simulation. Use 'shadow-2xl' and a white background centered on a gray canvas. Add zoom controls.

buttons.primary: bg-swiss-blue text-white rounded-sm hover:bg-blue-800 font-medium px-8 py-3 shadow-sm
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-gray-200 text-gray-900 rounded-sm hover:bg-gray-50

cards.interactive: bg-white border border-gray-200 hover:border-swiss-blue transition-colors cursor-pointer

inputs.style: bg-gray-50 border-b-2 border-transparent focus:border-swiss-blue focus:bg-white transition-colors rounded-none px-4 py-3

progress_bars.style: Height 8px. Sharp corners. Background gray-100. Fill swiss-blue.

upload_zone.style: Dashed border 'border-2 border-dashed border-gray-300'. Minimalist icon. Large padding 'p-20'. Hover state: 'border-swiss-blue bg-blue-50/50'.

images.description: Clean, minimalist office workspace. Use as a subtle background with low opacity or overlay.
Professional woman in suit. Use for testimonials or 'Success Stories' section.
Professional man in suit. Use for testimonials or 'Success Stories' section.

assets.icons: Use 'Lucide-React' for standard UI icons. Use 'Phosphor Icons' (Bold weight) for feature highlights.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is #111111 on #FFFFFF backgrounds. Avoid light gray text on white.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings using 'ring-2 ring-swiss-blue ring-offset-2'.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Swiss High-Contrast' theme. Avoid gradients.
Use 'Chivo' font for all headings. Import from Google Fonts.
Use 'Manrope' for body text. Import from Google Fonts.
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for the ATS Score display.
The 'ATS Score' component should look like a technical gauge or meter, not a generic donut chart.
For the Resume Preview, create a realistic 'Paper' look with a subtle drop shadow.
Do not use rounded buttons. Use sharp or slightly rounded (rounded-sm) buttons.
Ensure the 'Upload' area is massive and inviting.
Use the provided image URLs for the landing page.
Follow the 'Bento Grid' layout for the dashboard.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) sparingly, only for sticky headers.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
